displayName.text: CityMD Lower East Side Urgent Care - NYC

formattedAddress: 138 Delancey St, New York, NY 10002, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: CityMD Lower East Side Urgent Care - NYC
CityMD Lower East Side Urgent Care - NYC
CityMD Lower East Side Urgent Care - NYC

adrFormatAddress: 138 Delancey St, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text:
Waited in the waiting area 1 hour before being seen while I watched everyone who came in before and after me be seen and leave.
When I asked the front desk receptionist why it was that I had to wait so long she responded “it’s cuz your scribe was busy doing something but now she’s free, you SHOULD be next”. After being seen by the scribe she told me it was because the front desk potentially processed me late.
This location is an absolute joke and Samantha Barry the physician assistant who’s regularly there gives the absolute worst service. Whenever I go to any other location I get processed quickly and my test results come way quicker. Avoid this place would rate them 0 stars if I could.

This location is an absolute joke and Samantha Barry the physician assistant who’s regularly there gives the absolute worst service. Whenever I go to any other location I get processed quickly and my test results come way quicker. Avoid this place would rate them 0 stars if I could.

originalText.text: My family and I were treated extremely well and professionally by the medical team. However, when it came to the provider Rubina Khan Pa my experience completely changed. She entered the room in a very degrading manner and made unethical comments and remarks regarding our ethnicity. In many ways I felt as though my concerns were being disregarded and showed no empathy towards my husband and I and left feeling discontent. I would return to the clinic and would recommend others to come but not to be treated by this provider.

originalText.text: I have never had an issue at this site! The staff is kind and knowledgeable. My family and I have gotten really great care, especially when we were extremely ill. I have never waited no more than 15 minutes to be seen. I'm grateful to be able to come here to be treated when I am unable to see my doctor. Knowing that I still will get great care.

text.text: I have never had an issue at this site! The staff is kind and knowledgeable. My family and I have gotten really great care, especially when we were extremely ill. I have never waited no more than 15 minutes to be seen. I'm grateful to be able to come here to be treated when I am unable to see my doctor. Knowing that I still will get great care.

originalText.text: I came in very weak and sick. I had no idea what was wrong with me. I was hallucinating feverish I thought I may have Covid, but my testers always came back negative. It was actually a flu. I didn’t get one since I was very young. I forgotten how tough it is, Alexandra Devine, and Natania Took very good human care of me they realize I couldn’t wait that long so they took me in early after coming to greet me and ask me my symptoms in the waiting room. I was sweating profusely. I was very weak at one point it made me cry and Devine kindly rubbed my back affectionately. And it really helped me heal from that too. Good good doctors Do  know that the best medicine is kindness, and understanding . This is what I experienced At that particular location on Delancey street. Thank you again Alexandra and her staff. I came home sick but relieved I knew what it is the matter with me, and what to do about it.

originalText.text: I had very positive experience. I needed to get tested for Covid and from calling support to coming over and getting results was fast and easy. I really liked polite and kind staff. Thank you!
